</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	REXAHN PHARMACEUTICALS, INC.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Notes to Financial Statements
</DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z1907BCD4E2554E2FA4D76F6121EAFEAF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	16.
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Fair Value Measurements
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	ASC 820 defines fair value as the price that would be received to sell an asset or paid to transfer a liability in an orderly transaction between market participants at the measurement date, not adjusted for transaction costs.&#160; ASC 820 also establishes a fair value hierarchy that prioritizes the inputs to valuation techniques used to measure fair value into three broad levels giving the highest priority to quoted prices in active markets for identical assets or liabilities (Level 1) and the lowest priority to unobservable inputs (Level 3).
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The three levels are described below:
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_30"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 90%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z30A3AF0B9F1F46F3B316FAF552FAF636" BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18.44%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Level 1 Inputs
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8212;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Unadjusted quoted prices in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that are accessible by the Company;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18.44%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18.44%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Level 2 Inputs
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8212;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Quoted prices in markets that are not active or financial instruments for which all significant inputs are observable, either directly or indirectly;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18.44%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18.44%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Level 3 Inputs
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 2.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -12PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8212;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 66%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Unobservable inputs for the asset or liability including significant assumptions of the Company and other market participants.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The following tables present assets and liabilities that are measured at fair value on a recurring basis and are categorized using the fair value hierarchy.&#160; There have been no changes in the methodologies used at December 31, 2016 and 2015.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The fair value of the Company&#8217;s Level 2 marketable securities is determined by using quoted prices from independent pricing services that use market data for comparable securities in active or inactive markets.&#160; A variety of data inputs, including benchmark yields, interest rates, known historical trades and broker dealer quotes are using with pricing models to determine the quoted prices.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The fair value methodology for the warrant liabilities is disclosed in Note 12.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The carrying amounts reported in the financial statements for cash and cash equivalents (Level 1), prepaid expenses and other assets, and accounts payable and accrued expenses approximate fair value because of the short term maturity of these financial instruments.
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Additions consist of the fair value of warrant liabilities upon issuance.&#160; Transfers out of Level 3 for warrant liabilities consist of warrant exercises,
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	where
</FONT>
	the liability is converted to additional paid-in capital upon exercise.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The
</FONT>
	Company&#8217;s policy is to recognize transfers in and transfers out as of the actual date of the event or change in circumstance that caused the transfer.

<EFX_POWER_OF_ATTORNEY>
<A NAME="FIS_POWER_OF_ATTORNEY"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	POWER OF ATTORNEY
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	KNOW ALL PERSONS BY THESE PRESENTS, that each person whose signature appears below constitutes and appoints Tae Heum Jeong, a true and lawful attorney-in-fact and agent, with full power to him (including the full power of substitution and resubstitution), to sign for him or her and in his or her name, place and stead, in the capacity or capacities set forth below, (1) the Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016 to be filed by Rexahn Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#8220;Commission&#8221;) pursuant to Section 13 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, and (2) any amendments to the foregoing Annual Report, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto and other documents in connection therewith, with the Commission, granting unto said attorney-in-fact and agent, full power and authority to do and perform each and every act and thing requisite and necessary to be done in connection therewith, as fully to all intents and purposes as he or she might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all that said attorney-in-fact and agent, or his or her substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue hereof.
</DIV>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<DIV>
<HR STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: MEDIUM NONE; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; BORDER-LEFT: MEDIUM NONE; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; HEIGHT: 4PX; COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-LEFT: AUTO; BORDER-TOP: MEDIUM NONE; MARGIN-RIGHT: AUTO; BORDER-RIGHT: MEDIUM NONE" ALIGN="CENTER" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Exhibit 31.1
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO RULES 13A-14(D)
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	AND 15D-14(D)
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	I, Peter D. Suzdak, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z47BB90C2E780466A8107E966FB61ED1F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form 10-K of Rexahn Pharmaceuticals, Inc.;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z401875EC36414B34923C679E8979C816" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="ZD46A3385D58B403C81E4FFDBBD8F07D0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z773C46147910482D9DAAEF43BFA5AE99" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z5026FDC026D24D35B801CB3D3A8E7008" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="ZF69AD33139214ADEA76EB855B429AEE7" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z504E0169BFDA402A9CAFD52ECD3704BF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z1916DFE3B31944C3AB554038E5765F06" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	d.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Disclosed in this annual report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="ZEED246375B5B493AB822E1E8DC3BD146" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z9491AC5539C349038378025DC6E5C87B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="ZD7080252C845495F8C912814F0AF7E7E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z0BF9C05839D0470CB82CE5C95C275594" BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV>

	I, Tae Heum Jeong, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="ZC20F9AA4120B4BB5B65CD338ADAF74A3" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

</DIV>
</TD>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z68F5716E77F0443D9D330D4BC184100E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z19580BF5539A4A578BA95E3A3A24ED07" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="ZFB550D922B8A4B83A60380ABECF6CB6B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="ZB936DC937B0748A9AE3A2BC87A58F077" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="Z39A6675FE6B34586B86A21C70EE26F7B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Disclosed in this annual report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
</TD>

	a.

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</DIV>
